title: "Martyred freedom fighter yet to get recognition after 49 years of independence"
excerpt: "Sadly, his martyrdom remains unrecognized by the nation as Bangladesh is yet to have a comprehensive list of Freedom Fighters. He was neither declared as a gazetted martyred freedom fighter, nor was any monument or establishment built in Faridpur in memory of his sacrifice."
